fields.name: ClassificationsToInclude
fields.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Windows.

fields.name: ExcludeKbsRequiringReboot
fields.description: Filters out Kbs that don't have an InstallationRebootBehavior of 'NeverReboots' when this is set to true.

fields.name: KbNumbersToExclude
fields.description: Kbs to exclude in the patch operation

fields.name: KbNumbersToInclude
fields.description: Kbs to include in the patch operation

fields.name: MaxPatchPublishDate
fields.description: This is used to install patches that were published on or before this given max published date.
